<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=KSP%2Btheme%2Bjam&channel=avera9ejoe&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=4318413"></object></p>

<p>Today’s Twitch video is a bit different from the rest. It may not be gameplay, but <strong>Avera9eJoe</strong> and <strong>Issac</strong> are definitely playing something from the game. Check out their jam on the <em>KSP</em> main theme.</p>

Thank you so much!

Removed stuff

Nice sound guys, I really like it!

Makes me wish I had some musical talent.
